full_text:
I apologize, but the provided HTML does not appear to be a fact-check article. This looks like YouTube's page skeleton HTML, which contains placeholder elements and site structure, but no actual content. 

To extract a fact-check article's content, I would need the actual HTML of the fact-check report. Could you please provide the correct HTML for the fact-check article you want me to process?

To help me extract the content effectively, the HTML should include:
- The main article body
- Headline
- Claim section
- Detailed fact-check explanation
- Sources/citations
title: The link open with a BBC report but the wesite url isn't look like the original one. After running a keyword search on the internet we couldn't find any report on Amitabh Bachchan’s house arrest. More over in his interview with Kalki director Nag Ashwin, actor Amitabh Banchan did not say any thing on his income.
